column5: I want to pick up a deep cycle battery when i get up to North Bay tomorrow. nothing fancy just a deep cycle cheapie. Just need it for the trolling motor only which only gets used seldom. Anyone suggest a place to check thanks
I would check out Giesler Marine a half hour south in Powassan!

Well canadian tire sells about 10 different styles of deep-cycle marine & r.v.  batteries,from about $50-$150 thats where i got mine for my lund ,they have a great warranty as well,bring your old one and you get a discount too....good-luck    oh ya wal-mart has them too....cheers
Costco .I think only sudbury has a Costco not Northbay.I have had 2 Kirkland batteries great bang for the buck.  MTP
If you can find a Costco the Kirkland (Costco's own brand) are pretty good and cheap. I picked up the biggest deep cycle they have for 59.99 on sale two years ago......no complaints yet.
no costco in north bay but you can hit the one in barrie on your way up.  i think its just off the 400.  walmart and canadian tire both in north bay will have marine batteries too.  cheers!
Walmart usually has the best price.
